member.name: M:DataLayer.StargazerRepositoryService`1.CreateAsync(DataLayer.Interfaces.IStarRepository,DataLayer.Interfaces.IConstellationRepository,DataLayer.Interfaces.IMessierRepository)
member.summary: Asynchronously creates a new instance of StargazerRepositoryService
member.param: Used to access a repository of Yale Stars
Used to access a repository of constellations identified by the HIP ID
Used to access a repository of Messier Deep Space Objects

member.summary: Gathers all stars that are a part of constellations into a separate dictionary using the HipparcosId as the key. This is because the Hip ID is used by the constellations to list the nodes of the constellation graph. Removes the stars from the master listing.
member.param: The star repository retrieval task
The constellation repository retrieval task
The star repository so that constellation stars that were filtered out can be retrieved by HipparcosId
member.exception: If a constellation star cannot be found.

member.name: M:DataLayer.StargazerRepositoryService`1.UpdateUserPosition(System.Double,System.Double,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Makes an async call to convert all data from Equatorial to Horizontal coordinates based on supplied user data.
member.param: The latitude of the observer (-90 <= value <= 90)
The longitude of the observer (-90 <= value <= 90)
The observer time in Universal TimeCode new DateTime(year, month, day, hour, min, sec).ToUniversalTime()
member.returns: A package containing all data required for display. (This call should be made in an async method using the await keyword)
